creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: unsigned; mounted fan painting; group of men walking alongside a carriage at R under red torii gate; another group of men with two carriages at L, with three men seated on ground at UL;; scene is divided by gold clouds
medium: Ink, color, and gold on paper
title: The "Channel Buoys" Chapter of the Tale of Genji
